mapper.select: SELECT Q_NO , Q_DEPT_CODE , USER_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , Q_DATE , Q_STATUS , REPLY , REPLY_DATE , REPLY_MODIFY_DATE , Q_DEPT , USER_NICKNAME , USER_PHONE FROM QNA JOIN QNA_DEPT USING(Q_DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE Q_NO = #{qNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT Q_NO , Q_DEPT_CODE , USER_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , Q_DATE , Q_STATUS , REPLY , REPLY_DATE , REPLY_MODIFY_DATE , Q_DEPT , USER_NICKNAME , USER_PHONE FROM QNA JOIN QNA_DEPT USING(Q_DEPT_CODE) left JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) ORDER BY Q_NO DESC)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT Q_NO , Q_DEPT_CODE , USER_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , Q_DATE , Q_STATUS , REPLY , REPLY_DATE , REPLY_MODIFY_DATE , Q_DEPT , USER_NICKNAME , USER_PHONE FROM QNA JOIN QNA_DEPT USING(Q_DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) ORDER BY Q_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT PAY_NO , PAY_DATE FROM PAYMENT ORDER BY PAY_NO DESC)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT P.PAY_NO , P.PAY_DATE , P.PAY_METHOD , P.ORDERER_PHONE , P.ORDERER_EMAIL , P.ORDER_STATUS , P.USER_NO , D.PRODUCT_NO , D.QUANTITY , T.PRODUCT_BRAND , T.PRODUCT_TITLE , T.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM PAYMENT P JOIN PAY_DETAIL D ON(P.PAY_NO=D.PAY_NO) JOIN PRODUCT T ON(D.PRODUCT_NO=T.PRODUCT_NO) ORDER BY P.PAY_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
